page.title: 05INTERVEIW WITH KELSEY,ARLEY
page.content: Mr.Kelsey lives in, Old Arley with his son and daughter.He was born 15th August 1887 and is 98 years old.He has 4 brothers,4 children,8 grand children and 3 great grand children.He went to Old Nicholas Chamberlain school and then Bablake where he and his 4 brothers all passed scholarships. Queen Victoria was on the throne when he was born and he's seen 2 world wars.Instead of fighting he served on the Royal Agricultural Committee. He has always been a farmer.The main changes he has noticed are the closing of the Arley pit and the opening of the Dawmill pit. In 1984 he retired as chuch warden and has always been involved in local affairs. He loves reading and history and is a happy man.
